articles.title: Caitlin Clark pulls out of All-Star weekend because of groin injury - AP News
articles.description: Caitlin Clark is out of All-Star weekend as a participant. The Indiana Fever guard injured her right groin on Tuesday night in the final minute of the team’s win over the Connecticut Sun. She said Thursday in a message posted on X that she was “sad and disapp…
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS (AP) Caitlin Clark is out of All-Star weekend.
The Indiana Fever guard injured her right groin on Tuesday night in the final minute of the teams win over the Connecticut Sun. She said T… [+2051 chars]
